title: New: Tame Impala – Apocalypse Dreams
body:
A welcome start to those upcoming muggy summer months comes in the form of _Apocalypse Dreams_; **Tame Impala’s** freshly released single from their upcoming sophomore album **Lonerism**.

This track lulls you into a false sense of security with the first three minutes of pop filled beats before kicking in with that amazing psychedelic freakout that remains faithful to the original vibes of **Innerspeaker**.
